asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/grey-away-root-concealer-in-black-to-medium-brown/1040154756?Keyword=gray+away
This instant gray root touch-up spray matches hair colors from black to deep medium brown. Dye-and peroxide-free formula won't flake and conveniently washes out with shampoo.
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/grey-away-root-concealer-in-medium-brown-to-dark-blonde/1040154763?Keyword=gray+away
This instant gray root touch-up spray matches hair colors from medium brown to dark blonde. Dye-and peroxide-free formula won't flake and conveniently washes out with shampoo. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.
